fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one person each night to gifmail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Gifmailed targets can only speak in gifs for the day, including in private channels.
- If any gifmailed player sends a message that isn't a gif, they become blackmailed for the next three days.
- If any gifmailed player sends the "Repost if pigeon" gif they will be modkilled.
- You can read whispers.
- At any point you can send a gif anonymously to any player. If it's the "Repost if pigeon" gif, you will be modkilled.
